---
title: Fragment
icon: square-c
iconType: solid
---

> **注意**: このページはまだ日本語に翻訳されていません。以下は英語の原文です。

An abstract class to represent An individual fragment from a parse ABI.

## Extended by

- [`ConstructorFragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/ConstructorFragment)
- [`FallbackFragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/FallbackFragment)
- [`NamedFragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/NamedFragment)

## Properties

| Property | Modifier | Type | Description |
| :------ | :------ | :------ | :------ |
| `inputs` | `readonly` | readonly [`ParamType`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/ParamType)[] | The inputs for the fragment. |
| `type` | `readonly` | [`FragmentType`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/FragmentType) | The type of the fragment. |

## Methods

### format()

```ts
abstract format(format?): string
```

Returns a string representation of this fragment as `format`.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `format`? | [`FormatType`](/jp/sdk/content/type-aliases/FormatType) |

#### Returns

`string`

#### Source

[abi/fragments.ts:1055](https://github.com/dominant-strategies/quais.js/blob/c1c12d43f9d34c6baad2b0542bd6d0acd6fefcbf/src/abi/fragments.ts#L1055)

***

### from()

```ts
static from(obj): Fragment
```

Creates a new **Fragment** for `obj`, wich can be any supported ABI frgament type.

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `obj` | `any` |

#### Returns

[`Fragment`](/jp/sdk/content/classes/Fragment)

### isConstructor()

```ts
static isConstructor(value): value is ConstructorFragment
```

Returns true if `value` is a [**ConstructorFragment**](/jp/sdk/content/classes/ConstructorFragment).

#### Parameters

| Parameter | Type |
| :------ | :------ |
| `value` | `any` |

`value is ConstructorFragment`
